Posts.Content: On Sep Sep 15 2015 I visited at least 6 stores in Nashville TN for a zip front closure and didn't find anything satisfatory, so I'm going to stick with my Rhonda Shearer bras. My lumpectomy is 9/18/15 and I'm worried even though I've talked to my family & some friends.Â
Posts.Title: Bra suggestions following lumpectomy
